name: myopically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical
  specialized in a way that shows that you are not able to see clearly things that are far away: He peered myopically into the shadows at the side of the stage. She blinked myopically, trying to work out what was happening.
disapproving in a way that shows that you are unable to understand a situation or the way actions will affect it in the future: It's important not to focus too myopically on one side of the argument. The party seems to be myopically focused on a single issue.
More examplesFewer examplesAfter the operation, he opened his eyes and blinked myopically.He came out of the bathroom and looked around myopically.She peered myopically at the small print in the letter.They seem to be myopically obsessed with this news story.
